name: navigate
description: Loads the given URL in the browser.

name: findElement
description: Finds a single element matching the given selector.

name: findElements
description: Finds all elements matching the given selector.

name: click
description: Clicks on the specified element.

elementId.description: The internal ID of the element to click.

name: sendKeys
description: Types the given text into the specified element.

text.description: Text to send to the element.

name: clear
description: Clears the content of the specified text field element.

name: submit
description: Submits the form containing the specified element.

name: selectByValue
description: Selects an option in a `<select>` element by its value attribute.

name: selectByIndex
description: Selects an option in a `<select>` element by its index.

name: selectByVisibleText
description: Selects an option in a `<select>` element by its visible text.

name: hover
description: Moves the mouse pointer over the specified element.

name: doubleClick
description: Double-clicks on the specified element.

name: contextClick
description: Right-clicks (context clicks) on the specified element.

name: dragAndDrop
description: Drags the source element and drops it onto the target element.

name: waitForElement
description: Waits until an element matching the selector is present or timeout occurs.

timeout.description: Milliseconds to wait before timing out.

name: executeScript
description: Executes JavaScript in the context of the current page.

name: takeScreenshot
description: Takes a screenshot of the current viewport and returns it as a Base64-encoded string.

name: takeElementScreenshot
description: Takes a screenshot of the specified element only.

name: getCurrentUrl
description: Returns the URL of the current page.

name: getTitle
description: Returns the title of the current page.

name: getText
description: Gets the visible text of the specified element.

name: getAttribute
description: Gets the value of the specified attribute of an element.

name: isDisplayed
description: Checks whether the specified element is displayed.

name: isEnabled
description: Checks whether the specified element is enabled.

name: refresh
description: Refreshes the current page.

name: goBack
description: Navigates back in the browser’s history.

name: goForward
description: Navigates forward in the browser’s history.

name: switchToFrame
description: Switches context to the specified frame element.

name: switchToDefaultContent
description: Switches context back to the page’s default content.

name: switchToWindow
description: Switches context to the specified window handle.

name: acceptAlert
description: Accepts the currently open JavaScript alert/dialog.

name: dismissAlert
description: Dismisses the currently open JavaScript alert/dialog.

name: getAlertText
description: Retrieves the text from the currently open alert/dialog.

name: sendAlertText
description: Sends text to a prompt dialog.
